dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: Listen, I know you hate having to sit home because I'm not Susie High School.

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: I do care. But I'm a firm believer in doing something for your own reasons, not someone else ' s .

dialogue.speaker: BIANCA
dialogue.text: I wish I had that luxury. I'm the only sophomore that got asked to the prom and I can't go, because you won ' t.
